title: Morning dhikr
meaning: Glory is to Allah and praise is to Him.

title: Starting the day
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ مَا أَصْبَحَ بِي مِنْ نِعْمَةٍ فَمِنْكَ وَحْدَكَ لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ
translit: Allāhumma mā aṣbaḥa bī min ni‘mah fa-minka waḥdaka lā sharīka lak
meaning: O Allah, whatever blessing I or anyone from Your creation has woken up upon is from You alone, without partner.

title: Evening dhikr
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَمْسَيْتُ أُشْهِدُكَ وَأُشْهِدُ حَمَلَةَ عَرْشِكَ...
translit: Allāhumma innī amsaytu ush'hiduka wa ush'hidu ḥamalata ‘arshik...
meaning: O Allah, in the evening I call You and the bearers of Your throne to witness that You are Allah, there is no deity except You...

title: Master supplication for forgiveness (short version)
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَتُبْ عَلَيَّ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ
translit: Allāhumma-ghfir lī wa tub ‘alayya innaka anta at-Tawwābu r-Raḥīm
meaning: O Allah, forgive me and accept my repentance. Indeed, You are the Acceptor of repentance, the Most Merciful.

title: Relying on Allah
meaning: Sufficient for us is Allah, and He is the best disposer of affairs.

title: Delegating affairs
meaning: And I entrust my affair to Allah.

title: Asking for ease
meaning: My Lord, make it easy and do not make it difficult.

title: Seeking guidance
meaning: O Allah, guide me and keep me firm on the straight path.

title: Increase in knowledge
meaning: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.

title: For parents
meaning: My Lord, have mercy upon them as they raised me when I was small.

title: For family and offspring
arabic: رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَاجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
translit: Rabbanā hab lanā min azwājinā wa dhurriyyātinā qurrata a‘yunin waj‘alnā lil-muttaqīna imāmā
meaning: Our Lord, grant us from among our spouses and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous.

title: Protection from harm
arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
translit: Bismillāhil-ladhī lā yaḍurru ma‘a ismihī shay’un fī l-arḍi wa lā fī s-samā’i wa huwa s-Samī‘u l-‘Alīm
meaning: In the Name of Allah, with whose Name nothing on earth or in the heaven can cause harm, and He is the All-Hearing, All-Knowing.

title: Seeking refuge from evil
arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
translit: A‘ūdhu bikalimātillāhi t-tāmmāti min sharri mā khalaq
meaning: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.

title: Against anxiety and grief
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ
translit: Allāhumma innī a‘ūdhu bika minal-hammi wal-ḥazan
meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from anxiety and grief.

title: Firmness of the heart
arabic: يَا مُقَلِّبَ الْقُلُوبِ ثَبِّتْ قَلْبِي عَلَى دِينِكَ
meaning: O Turner of the hearts, keep my heart firm upon Your religion.

title: When facing decisions
meaning: Seek Allah's guidance (Istikhārah) in every matter.

title: For provision
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اكْفِنِي بِحَلَالِكَ عَنْ حَرَامِكَ وَأَغْنِنِي بِفَضْلِكَ عَمَّنْ سِوَاكَ
translit: Allāhumma-kfinī biḥalālika ‘an ḥarāmik, wa aghninī bi-faḍlika ‘amman siwāk
meaning: O Allah, suffice me with what You have allowed instead of what You have forbidden, and make me independent by Your grace from all others besides You.

title: Gratitude
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَعِنِّي عَلَى ذِكْرِكَ وَشُكْرِكَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِكَ
translit: Allāhumma a‘innī ‘alā dhikrika wa shukrika wa ḥusni ‘ibādatik
meaning: O Allah, help me remember You, thank You and worship You in the best way.
